channel.title: introduction on hugo-mysterium-theme
channel.description: Recent content in introduction on hugo-mysterium-theme

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: hugo-mysterium Hugo theme for personal gaming blog by seraphinush Demo Prerequisite Hugo Static Site Generator v0.64.0+ Setup git submodule add https://github.com/seraphinush/hugo-mysterium.git themes/hugo-mysterium Custom javascript Add custom.js file in /content folder Set customJs to true in config.toml config.toml example title = "Title" baseURL = "https://<my-account-id>.github.io/<repository-name>/" publishDir = "docs" languageCode = "en-us" theme = "hugo-mysterium" [params] description = "Description" dateFormat = "Monday, January 2, 2006" customJs = true || false # Favicon link #faviconUrl = "https://url-to-favicon.
